jobDescription: Data Analyst  Populus Group seeks a Data Analyst in Detroit, MI to solve complex business and data issues for information technology projects. Gather and analyze business and operational requirements to understand system needs and functionalities. Coordinate with subject matter experts to understand functionality of backend systems. Create technical and functional architecture diagrams for implementing data governance for the future. Create user stories, sprint backlog, and burndown charts for various sprints in an Agile framework. Write SQL Scripts and utilize SQL to analyze data. Utilize SQL queries to analyze various databases and tables and assess data anomalies. Ensure systems are interacting and functioning correctly. Ensure end to end system performance. Retrieve data from databases and create report tables in Tableau. Create adhoc reports and standard data reports for business users to assist in project determinations. Utilize the following technologies and tools MS Project, Waterfall, Rally, SQL Server, SSRS, SSIS, Hadoop, Hive, Sqoop, Impala, and HP Quality Center. Must have a Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a foreign equivalent, and at least 2 years of experience in the job offered or a substantially similar position.
